chara.textHome:
I love nature. The trees, the flowers,
the animals, and even the bugs.

Oh! And I LOVE playing with my friends!
Outside, inside, wherever!
Studying? Sure...I like it just fine.
Really! Really, I do!

But if I could, I'd just play
with my friends ALL DAY!
But I can't...can I?

I'm such a tea fanatic, I really
gotta try tea ceremony sometime!

Sure, everyone says they can't
imagine me doing it, but I totally can!

Hah! Wait a minute...
did I just get stronger?!

Even I can tell...
Something good just happened, didn't it?

There's a little forest grove near my house,
and I used to play there a lot.

I brought Leila and my other friends
there to play too, but I had
a lot of fun even when I was alone!

I used to make myself a little house for
when I'm playing alone in the forest grove.

I gathered branches and some cardboard
boxes I brought from home, and I made walls
and a ceiling out of them next to a big tree.
I'd just sit there an' read books!
Taaake that!
Mito attacks!
Heh heh, I was waitin' for ya!
Let's have a fun day today!
Good mornin'!
And...better mornin'!
Heh heh, I doubled up the greetin'!

You think it's too early to have
this much energy? What?!
You should start off the day full of energy!

I'm gonna be honest with ya... 
I'm super sleepy durin' class!

But I wanna study the best I can, so I use
my hands to keep my eyes pried open!

It's boring to walk the
same way home everyday,

so sometimes I take these crazy,
random paths back.

The other day it took me three hours
to get home!
*Snore*
Hmm?
Oh, I was asleep, sorry.
I can't help it though, I'm sleepy!
So anyway...good niiight...

When I space out, time sometimes
goes by really fast, but other times
it goes by really slow
Why does time always feel different?

My heart's racin' and I'm all
trembly and fidgety.
Is somethin' gonna happen?!
Let's head out and see!

This is a really strange place.
But it looks fun!
Hey, hey!
Can we walk around here a little?
I actually have an awesome sense of smell!

I bet I could guess the dinner of every
apartment in the complex!
To start...our neighbors are havin' curry!
What, too easy?
Talking to animals is super fun!
What are they sayin'?
I don't know!
But it doesn't matter!
It's what you feel that counts, ya know?
I used to be good at climbin' trees.
But I'm really bad now.

I mean, it takes me 30 whole seconds
to get to the top!
It used to only take me 10 seconds.

I love taking naps on the roof of the
apartment!

The wind blows, and I can hear the tree
leaves rustlin' and the sounds of people
living their lives... It feels so good.

I used to be obsessed with collecting
acorns. I made secret hidin' spots
for 'em all across the complex!
And actually...they're still hidden to this day!
Have you ever played hopscotch?

I drew a course around
the entire complex once!
But I was super exhausted by the end of it!

Sometimes I help Leila bake, but I can't
resist tasting everythin' while we make it...
Sorry, Leilaaa!

Seika's super quiet and pretty much the
exact opposite of me, but it's not hard
being around her.
Actually...it's really relaxing.

Myah, myah, meow! Myamyamyah, meow!
Meow, myamyameow! 
Meow, meow, myaaaow!
Oh, I was talkin' to the neighbor's cat!
I guess we gotta do this!
Hm? Looks like I won?
Whew... I'm glad you're okay.
I wooon! I did win, right?
That was tough. I need some water.

First's my last, with an "A" then an "i"
and a "no", and then's my first
with a "Mi" and a "to".
And you have me, Mito Aino!
Nice to meetcha!

This is kinda like how weeds get
stronger after gettin' stepped
on over and over.

Mhmm... I'd say this made me
kind of strong...right?

Progress! At this rate,
I can keep plowin' ahead!
Guess what, I love tea!

Especially green tea!
The smell is just AHH, can't get enough!
Hm? Surprised?
I've got a tea cup so big it's like POW!

I like green tea, and sometimes
I drink the kind with roasted leaves.

It's got such a soft, mild flavor...
It leaves me feeling fluffy an' warm all over!
